    • Method Detail

      • conjugate

        public java.lang.String conjugate(java.lang.String subject)
        Returns the verb conjugated to that subject.

        Returns the verb conjugated to that subject.

        Depending on the subject, the correct conjugation is returned (if statements used).

        Parameters:
        subject - The subject the verb will be conjugated to.
        Returns:
        The conjugated verb.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representation of this Verb.

        Returns a string representation of this Verb, including the conjugations (for loop 0-5 increment 1 used).

        Variable Dictionary:

        x int Loop variable.
